history.proof: unfold abs. hauto use: abs_opp, abs_opp_one unfold: AbsRing.base, AbsRing.Ring, abs, AbsRing.sort, Ring.AbelianGroup, AbsRing.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort, Ring.class, Ring.sort.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing Unable to unify "abs (opp one) = 1" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) one = 1".
